body.name: Savor | All-in-One Organizer | Blue – Keep Desk, and Home Organized Storage System for Important Files, Documents, Stationery, and Office Supplies
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 56 mins
features: ONE CONVENIENT HOME FOR KEY DOCUMENTS AND OBJECTS: The All-in-One Organizer offers one place to organize and then find essential items. 10 Acid-free files (6 vertical and 4 half-size), 2 compartments, and 2 drawers with ribbon pulls and 5 adjustable and dividable sections keep important office and household items safe and organized.

DURABLE, HIGH-QUALITY LUXE DISPLAY BOXES: Custom-dyed linen book cloth in modern colors coordinate easily with décor accessories to fit all bookshelves in all homes. It’s organization that’s beautiful.

DRAWERS, FILES AND LABELS PROVIDE EASY ORGANIZATION: 52 Hand-illustrated labels show you what to save and where to find it. No more rummaging around in drawers looking for lost passports, keys, receipts, office supplies or keepsakes.
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION PROTECTS YOUR IMPORTANT DOCUMENTS AND ITEMS: The magnetic and button tie closure, adjustable compartments, and stoppered drawers are built to last.

LIMITLESS USES TO DECLUTTER YOUR SPACE: The All-in-One Desk Organizer is meant to be displayed, it’s an elegant addition to office or library shelf décor. Keep important household items and paperwork contained; organize and declutter your desk, office, home, or library.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE VAULT KEEPS IMPORTANT ITEMS CLOSE AT HAND AND OUT OF SIGHT

THE SAVOR DIFFERENCE IS IN THE DETAILS LABELS SHOW YOU WHAT TO SAVE 52 hand-illustrated labels show you what to save and where to find it, making home or office organization simple. A PLACE FOR THE THINGS THAT MATTER 10 vertical (6 vertical and 4 half-size) acid-free files protect important papers. THOUGHTFUL DETAILS Custom-dyed luxe cloth - not just paper that looks like cloth - makes it sturdier to protect objects. Files of acid-free paper keep your documents safe. STORAGE THAT'S FLEXIBLE Flexible storage for every need with 2 caddies and 2 drawers with removable dividers.
SAVOR REINVENTS ORGANIZATION TO MAKE IT CHIC & SIMPLE

Folio: For Documents Safe Deposit Box: For Objects The Vault: For Documents & Objects Baby Edition: For Keepsakes from 0-4 School Years Edition: For Keepsakes 4+ Wedding Edition: For Special Objects that tell the Story of We. What items does it save best? Official papers, leases, wills, letters, articles, recipes, holiday cards, estate planning, event planning (from a bar mitzvah to a wedding to a home renovation project). Use it with dividers for phone chargers and cables, collections, crafting, keepsakes or sewing. Remove the dividers for letters, photos, greeting cards or remotes. Perfect for household documents and important objects like passports, photos, and passwords. But can also be used as a crafting center, for gift wrap, greeting card storage. Guides you in what to keep from babyhood and where to find it. For the child in school or the consummate student. Save imp Comes with stitched vellum envelopes for invitation and tablescapes, fabric bag for hair pieces or bouquet petals. Signature labeling system that guides you in what to save? ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Custom-dyed fabric & archival paper? ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Size 11.1" x 2" x 12.88" 10.02" x 3.5" x 12.88" 10.02" x 5" x 12.88" 10.02" x 7.3" x 12.88" 10.02" x 7.3" x 12.88" 10.02" X 7.3" X 12.88"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the cost
reviews.reviewText: While this is more expensive than I’d prefer, it’s actually worth it. Its incredibly sturdy, fits a lot of stuff, and creates peace of mind knowing all my important items are organized and secure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter loved it!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my daughter to store papers and memories from senior graduation. She loved it. All important papers in one place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fabric covered cardboard(?) in a nice shade of navy blue. Drawers are nice BUT none are big enough to hold pens, highlighters, pencils etc.. The included labels do not show up will on files or drawers. I needed more files; happily any file fits in left cubby vertically.Pricey for what it is. Would buy again if on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another quality Savor product; I love it!
reviews.reviewText: Once again, Savor did not disappoint. The Vault is the ultimate clutter catcher, and I can actually see my countertops again! It is the perfect size to tuck away, yet nice enough to keep on display. I love the half-pocket file folders, which are the perfect size for corralling receipts & coupons. I have several Savor Keepsake boxes and have given many as gifts; I am excited to add this to my collection! I have yet to be disappointed in Savor’s product quality, & their customer service is wonderful to work with. Well done, Savor, and thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Savor All-in-one fabric Case
reviews.reviewText: This all-in-one storage is very useful and sturdy. I purchased this storage case to free up space on my desk. All of my papers that I need immediate access to is stored neatly in this case. Also, the dividers and inserts are a great way to keep my papers separated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the organization, but was on the expensive side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped me organize my desk!
reviews.reviewText: Just received my Vault, and I have to say it’s actually better in person because I didn’t realize how nice the fabric was. My desk has more desktop space than drawer space so I put the Vault on top of my desk and am using it as a sort of second desk drawer with more organization than a typical desk drawer, for checkbooks, stamps, keys, paperclips, and cards I bought but haven’t sent. Love being more organized and the classic styling helps so it can be displayed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love the sturdy construction. There are drawers and pockets and pre-made labels. I bought three of these to organize my gifts, photos and documents I want to leave to family members. Highly recommend.
